condition.p: When you run your test with Jenkins on Ubuntu using the Jenkins pipeline script (Jenkinsfile), you might encounter the error: "java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/openqa/selenium/WebElement"

cause.p: This error happens because Jenkins requires the read, write, and execute permissions to the Katalon Runtime Engine installed folder.

step.cmd: To resolve this error, add the read, write, and execute permissions to the Katalon Runtime Engine installed folder and rerun the Jenkins job. Run the following command:

info.codeblock: sudo chmod -R 777 <path to the Katalon Runtime Engine installed folder>
